actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method of determining cost-of-living increases payable to civil service annuitants.

summary.text: Revises the formula for determining when to make cost-of-living adjustments in Federal civil service annuities. Eliminates the one percent increase which is automatically added on to such adjustments.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method of determining cost-of-living increases payable to civil service annuitants.
